# Urbanoise
Urbanoise is a film and photography studio focused on architectural documentaries and spatial storytelling.

## Primary site
https://urbanoise.com/

## Content sources
Blog posts are published as static pages under /blog/{slug}. Prefer these pages for full articles.

## Index and discovery
Sitemap index: https://urbanoise.com/sitemap-index.xml

## Access policy
Allow: /
Disallow: /wpheadless/

## Contact
info@urbanoise.com
